author: Rascal
title: Re: â€˜Repugnantâ€™ Richard Spencer gets BOOTED from #CPAC2017; MSM hardest hit
text:
â€˜Repugnantâ€™ Richard Spencer gets BOOTED from #CPAC2017; MSM hardest hit Posted at 12:10 pm on February 23, 2017 by Greg P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Well, things arenâ€™t going too well for white nationalist Richard Spencer who showed up at CPAC today: Grizzly Joe, the hero America needs but doesn't deserve, just told Richard Spencer, "you're a f***ing piece of sh*t" pic.twitter.com/SX1WKSriNg 
â€” Haley Byrd (@byrdinator) February 23, 2017 "Get the f**k out of here you piece of sh*t"â€“ a patriotic blogger yells at Richard Spencer as he is swarmed by media 
â€” Charlie Spiering (@charliespiering) February 23, 2017 
Spencer replied that Grizzly Joe is a moron who canâ€™t dress: A man just called Richard Spencer "a piece of sh*t." Spencer says he's a moron who can't dress. #CPAC2017 pic.twitter.com/XxQHyaLLue 
â€” Amber Ferguson (@Ms_AmberDawn) February 23, 2017 
And shortly after this exchange, Spencer was kicked out of CPAC: CPAC spox Ian Walters says Richard Spencer was removed because he is "repugnant." 
â€” Benjy Sarlin (@BenjySarlin) February 23, 2017 While I was interviewing Richard Spencer, security came to escort him off the property 
â€” Olivia Nuzzi (@Olivianuzzi) February 23, 2017 He's currently being escorted out of CPAC by security 
â€” Olivia Nuzzi (@Olivianuzzi) February 23, 2017 Security tells me CPAC says Richard Spencer doesn't represent their views and so he can't be here even though he bought a ticket 
â€” Olivia Nuzzi (@Olivianuzzi) February 23, 2017 Security just walked up to Spencer and asked for him to give up his credentials, which he did 
â€” Olivia Nuzzi (@Olivianuzzi) February 23, 2017 Trending D MN! Ben Shapiro gives Bernie Sanders a lesson on fascism, and it ain't pretty 
CPAC will even give Spencer a refund if he wants: SCOOP: CPAC organizer tells me the ACU thinks Richard Spencer's views "are repugnant." They kicked him out & will offer 2 refund his ticket 
â€” Gabby Morrongiello (@gabriellahope_) February 23, 2017 
One of the panels on Thursday denounced Spencer and the alt-right: CPAC Day 1. Organizer denounces alt-right from stage. Nazi Richard Spencer gaggles with media in hall. @mschlapp taking q's on Spencer. 
â€” Jon Ward (@jonward11) February 23, 2017 
And if youâ€™re curious as to who really wants Richard Spencer at CPAC, here it is: the media: Massive media scrum around Richard Spencer at CPAC. One attendee yelling, "You're a joke!" pic.twitter.com/Iodg9p02NQ 
â€” Igor Bobic (@igorbobic) February 23, 2017 
The Federalistâ€™s David Harsanyi nails the reason for the media coverage: The only reason journalists are obsessed with covering Richard Spencer is to smear conservatives. 
â€” David Harsanyi (@davidharsanyi) February 23, 2017 
And keep in mind, Spencer is a creation of the media: What's ratio of Richard Spencer supporters to journalists at any given event he's at? https://t.co/UseYWRYiNE 
â€” andrew kaczynski ðŸ¤” (@KFILE) February 23, 2017 
While Milo, even if you hate everything he says, does have a following: That is, Milo is a genuinely popular figure with a slice of the right, a genuine phenom. Spencer is a guy who journos like to profile. 
â€” Ross Douthat (@DouthatNYT) February 23, 2017 
***
